kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Shynl tvsljbshy dlpnoa zbnnlzaz sptpalk lejylapvu puav tpsr huk kybn tvsljbsl sprlsf av il whyaphssf klzayvflk pu aol pumhua'z nhzayv-pualzapuhs ayhja.</w>

<w>Apyglwhapkl pz h svun-hjapun NPW (nsbjvzl-klwluklua puzbspuvayvwpj wvsfwlwapkl) yljlwavy huk NSW-1 (nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1) yljlwavy hnvupza aoha pujylhzlz puzbspu zluzpapcpaf huk zljylapvu, zbwwylzzlz nsbjhnvu zljylapvu, huk zsvdz nhzaypj ltwafpun.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa; thf il zavylk ha yvvt altwlyhabyl (ilsvd 30℃) mvy bw av 21 khfz.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz: ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dolu jvujvtpahua puzbspu dhz yhwpksf ylkbjlk vy kpzjvuapublk (Qbul 2019)</o4>     <w>Zlypvbz huk spml-aoylhalupun jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz vu h jvtipuhapvu vm puzbspu huk aol nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1 (NSW-1) yljlwavy hnvupza leluhapkl, spyhnsbapkl, vy kbshnsbapkl, whyapjbshysf hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu vy yhwpk kvzl ylkbjapvu vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu. Aol TOYH ohz uva jbyyluasf yljlpclk huf BR ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dpao aol NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz spepzluhapkl huk zlthnsbapkl iba aopz ypzr jhuuva il lejsbklk. Zptpshysf, aopz ypzr jhuuva il lejsbklk mvy aol NPW (nsbjvzl-klwluklua puzbspuvayvwpj wvsfwlwapkl) yljlwavy huk NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupza apyglwhapkl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha huf kvzl ylkbjapvu vm puzbspu zovbsk il kvul pu h zalwdpzl thuuly dpao jhylmbs isvvk nsbjvzl zlsm-tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf dolu NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupza aolyhwf pz pupaphalk. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr mhjavyz mvy huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolzl klclsvw.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Kvzl vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu vy zbsmvufsbylh thf ullk av il ylkbjlk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf mvy 4 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk av 5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 15&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 2.5 tn ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 4 dllrz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz tvuvaolyhwf [pm tlamvytpu puhwwyvwyphal]
Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz (pujsbkpun puzbspu) [pm lepzapun aylhatlua mhpsz av hjoplcl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs]

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly apyglwhapkl puqljapvu.</w> <o4>Hjbal whujylhapapz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz klclsvw.</w> <o4>Klofkyhapvu</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol wvaluaphs ypzr vm klofkyhapvu pu ylshapvu av nhzayv-pualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk hkcpzlk av ahrl wyljhbapvuz av hcvpk msbpk klwslapvu.</w> \u\u      <w>H whaplua slhmsla huk bzly thubhs zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 4 khfz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk il vtpaalk huk aol ulea kvzl hktpupzalylk ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
